item.title: ELECTRONIC FLIGHT BAG (EFB) SYSTEM – AIRPORT MOVING MAP DATABASE – STC ST02053LA

remarks.para: May be out of date provided alternate procedures are established and used.

numlitem.para: Crew will use current aeronautical charts to verify airport map information.

placard.para: Placard both EFB Display Units "AIRPORT MAP DATABASE IS OUT OF DATE" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
